titleStmt.title: Mary Magdalens love to Christ. Opened in a sermon preached at the funeral of Mistris Elizabeth Thomason. April. 11. 1659. / By Edw. Reynolds D.D.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.date: Printed in the year of our Lord, 1659.

notesStmt.note: A funeral sermon for George Thomason's daughter.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
